name: Carlos Fuentes
description: Mexican novelist, essayist, and diplomat, one of the most celebrated writers of the Latin American Boom
philosophy: Literature is the memory of humanity. Writing is a way of talking without being interrupted.
quotes: What America does best is to understand itself. What it does worst is understand others
The United States is a country of laws, not men. But laws are made and enforced by men
Writing is a struggle against silence
